communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Digital and Paper Records in the form(s) of emails, meeting minutes, policy documents and reports (general) containing two (2) or more of the following keywords: "Rev. Al", "Al Sharpton", "Rev. Al Sharpton", "Reverend Al", "Reverend Al Sharpton", "Assata Shakur", "Assata", "Shakur", "Byron", "BLA", Black Liberation Army", "Liberation Army"

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

kevin

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Plataforma Centinela - State of Chihuahua
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All communications, including emails, letters, agreements between the Texas Attorney General's Office and officials from the Chihuahua Governor's Office or the Secretaria de Seguridad Pública Estatal  regarding or referencing the Plataforma Centinela, Torre Centinela, Sentinel Platform or Sentinel Tower. 
- All presentations or other explanatory records provided to the Texas Attorney General's Office by officials from Chihuahua Governor's Office or the Secretaria de Seguridad Pública Estatal  regarding or referencing the Plataforma Centinela, Torre Centinela, Sentinel Platform or Sentinel Tower.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dave Maass
Director of Investigations
Electronic Frontier Foundation
